pullRequest.title: fixes for inline subqueries when multi-value dimension is present
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #9697.
Description
Modifies Group By queries to treat unknown column capabilities as potentially multi-value dimensions, and TopN query to use HeapBasedTopNAlgorithm when capabilities are unknown to handle strings without known cardinality and numbers.

This PR has:

 been self-reviewed.
 added unit tests or modified existing tests to cover new code paths.
 been tested in a test Druid cluster.



Key changed/added classes in this PR

GroupByQueryEngineV2
TopNQueryEngine

commit.message: fixes for inline subqueries when multi-value dimension is present
allow missing capabilities for vectorized group by queries to be treated as single dims since it means that column doesnt exist

nodes.bodyText: nit: maybe nice to comment when columnCapabilities can be null?
